channel.title: Unwritten Words
channel.description: A collection of unspoken thoughts, unfinished sentences, unwritten words..

item.title: Sunshine
item.description:
A gaze like sunshine amidst clouds of rain.
With beauty that cleanses the soul evaporating the pain.
Beyond the veils of darkness an image we seek to see,
is a face whose memories make a meaningless life proceed.
item.dc:creator: Anudeep
item.content:encoded:
A gaze like sunshine amidst clouds of rain.
With beauty that cleanses the soul evaporating the pain.
Beyond the veils of darkness an image we seek to see,
is a face whose memories make a meaningless life proceed.

item.title: The Ethereal
item.description:
On the calm shores where time met tide,
moments of clarity welcomed waves of delirium.
Where the light doesn't fall, would you dare try seeing?
For it was the darkness that shone on a soul and cast a shadow of my being.
item.dc:creator: Anudeep
item.content:encoded:
On the calm shores where time met tide,
moments of clarity welcomed waves of delirium.
Where the light doesn't fall, would you dare try seeing?
For it was the darkness that shone on a soul and cast a shadow of my being.
